name: Architect
description:
Architect your Marketing, Database, UX, App, User Flow & more with well crafted components to help communicate concepts & document ideation.


Visual planning & preparation never looked so good. Helpful components let you set up various views, nodes, connections, notes, lists, checklists, comments & customize it the way you want.


Most components offer several nested variants to change styles and options such as marking a comment "Read" or changing a node state. Also change Title options, icons, team cards & note sizes to fit your architecture & flow requirements.


I hope you enjoy this as much as I do and I want this to make your time architecting your projects more easy & fun.


Thanks for any support & feedback! It is much appreciated!



UPDATE (04/1/2021):

  • Cleaned up every components and utility. The entire library is all single components now with variations per component. This makes it much easier to use as the assets panel looks much more simple and light.
  • Added new Mobile and Web Views with Modals as well as a Database view.
  • Added 2 new path options for both solid and dotted path styles.
  • Added Two-Way arrow options (arrows on both ends of the paths) as well as a variant with no arrows.
